description: Interact seamlessly with GitLab repositories to manage merge requests and issues. Fetch details, add comments, and streamline your code review process with ease.

capabilities.name: get_projects
capabilities.description: Get a list of projects with id, name, description, web_url and other useful information.

capabilities.name: list_open_merge_requests
capabilities.description: Lists all open merge requests in the project

capabilities.name: get_merge_request_details
capabilities.description: Get details about a specific merge request of a project like title, source-branch, target-branch, web_url, ...

capabilities.name: get_merge_request_comments
capabilities.description: Get general and file diff comments of a certain merge request

capabilities.name: add_merge_request_comment
capabilities.description: Add a general comment to a merge request

capabilities.name: add_merge_request_diff_comment
capabilities.description: Add a comment of a merge request at a specific line in a file diff

capabilities.name: get_merge_request_diff
capabilities.description: Get the file diffs of a certain merge request

capabilities.name: get_issue_details
capabilities.description: Get details of an issue within a certain project

capabilities.name: set_merge_request_description
capabilities.description: Set the description of a merge request

capabilities.name: set_merge_request_title
capabilities.description: Set the title of a merge request
